description:
These thin socks fit comfortably into close-fitting cycling shoes, with breathable fabric and an anti-odour treatment for sweaty feet that know no limits.

  • Q Skin yarns with silver microparticles to keep feet and shoes fresh
  • Compression cuff keeps sock in place
  • Midfoot support band for a snug fit
  • Flat-seam toe for chafe-free comfort
name: Castelli Velocissima 12 Socks - Women's
